方法详细信息

decode

public static java.lang.String decode(java.lang.String key,
                                      byte[] data,
                                      java.lang.String charset)
Transform a byte array into a string given the encoding. If the encoding is bad then it just does it as a string.

参数：
data - The byte array to be converted
charset - The encoding of the byte array
返回：
a string that is UTF-8 internally

decode

public static java.lang.String decode(java.lang.String key,
                                      byte[] data,
                                      int length,
                                      java.lang.String charset)
Transform a portion of a byte array into a string given the encoding. If the encoding is bad then it just does it as a string.

参数：
data - The byte array to be converted
length - The number of bytes to use.
charset - The encoding of the byte array
返回：
a string that is UTF-8 internally

decode

public static java.lang.String decode(java.lang.String key,
                                      byte[] data,
                                      int offset,
                                      int length,
                                      java.lang.String charset)
Transform a portion of a byte array starting at an offset into a string given the encoding. If the encoding is bad then it just does it as a string.

参数：
data - The byte array to be converted
offset - The starting position in the byte array
length - The number of bytes to use.
charset - The encoding of the byte array
返回：
a string that is UTF-8 internally

clean1252

public static void clean1252(java.lang.String key,
                             byte[] data)
Remove rogue characters in the source. These are characters that are not valid in cp1252 aka WINDOWS-1252 and in UTF-8 or are non-printing control characters in the range of 0-32.

clean1252

public static void clean1252(java.lang.String key,
                             byte[] data,
                             int length)
Remove rogue characters in the source. These are characters that are not valid in cp1252 aka WINDOWS-1252 and in UTF-8 or are non-printing control characters in the range of 0-32.
